Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons

Interface Weapon

All Known Implementing Classes:
Club, GreatKnife, Grossmesser, IntrinsicWeapon, Scimitar, Stick, Uchigatana, WeaponItem
public interface Weapon
Interface for weapon items. As well as providing methods needed by weapons, this interface is used in Item to determine whether an item can be used as a weapon.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    chanceToHit()
    A chance to hit the target (this is the dividend of percentage)

    Get an active skill action from the weapon.

  • Method Details

    • damage

      int damage()
      The amount of damage the Weapon will inflict
      Returns:
      the damage, in hitpoints

    • verb

      String verb()
      A verb to use when displaying the results of attacking with this Weapon
      Returns:
      String, e.g. "punches", "zaps"

    • chanceToHit

      int chanceToHit()
      A chance to hit the target (this is the dividend of percentage)
      Returns:
      the chance, in integer for probability with nextInt()

    • getSkill

      default Action getSkill​(Actor target, String direction)
      Get an active skill action from the weapon. Use this method if you want to use a weapon skill against one targeted Actor (i.e, special attack, heal, stun, etc.).
      Parameters:
      target - target actor
      Returns:
      a special Action that can be performed by this weapon (perform special attack on the enemy, etc.)

    • getSkill

      default Action getSkill​(Actor holder)
      Get an active skill action from the weapon. This should be used for weapon skills that do not involve a target actor For instance, healing the holder of the weapon, switching current weapon's attack, e.g. from normal attack to fire attack
      Parameters:
      holder - weapon holder
      Returns:
      a special Action that can be performed by this weapon (heal the player, etc.)
